remarks: A cyclically shifted word can be reconstructed by cyclically shifting it again twice.  Lemma for ~ erclwwlktr and ~ erclwwlkntr .  (Contributed by AV, 9-Apr-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 11-Jun-2018.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 3-Nov-2018.)
statement:
cshwcsh2id.1 $e |- ( ph -> z e. Word V ) $.
cshwcsh2id.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( # ` y ) = ( # ` z ) /\ ( # ` x ) = ( # ` y ) ) ) $.
cshwcsh2id $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( m e. ( 0 ... ( # ` y ) ) /\ x = ( y cyclShift m ) ) /\ ( k e. ( 0 ... ( # ` z ) ) /\ y = ( z cyclShift k ) ) ) -> E. n e. ( 0 ... ( # ` z ) ) x = ( z cyclShift n ) ) ) $.
$d k m n x z $.
